simulator

Class PathOnTheFly

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.Path
      • simulator.PathOnTheFly

  • public class PathOnTheFly
extends Path
    Stores and manipulates a path though a model. Minimal info is stored - just enough to allow checking of properties.

      • getPreviousModuleOrActionIndex

        public int getPreviousModuleOrActionIndex()
        Description copied from class: Path
        Get the index i of the action taken in the previous step. If i>0, then i-1 is the index of an action label (0-indexed) If i<0, then -i-1 is the index of a module (0-indexed)
        Specified by:
        getPreviousModuleOrActionIndex in class Path

      • getTotalTime

        public double getTotalTime()
        Description copied from class: Path
        Get the total time elapsed so far (where zero time has been spent in the current (final) state). For discrete-time models, this is just the number of steps (but returned as a double).
        Specified by:
        getTotalTime in class Path
